channel.name: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb

messages.text: Hi Sophia,Thanks again for your time last week. I’ve attached the formal proposal forthe Sales Suite Upgrade. It includes the AI enhancement bundle and reflects the 8% discount we discussed.Let me know if you’d like to go over any specifics.Best,Bruce
Hi Bruce,Appreciate the quick turnaround. This looks aligned overall — I’ll forwardit to our RevOps lead and circle back with any questions.Regards,Sophia
Hi Sophia,Just wanted to check if your team had a chance to review the proposal.We’re flexible on start dates if that helps align internally.Cheers,Bruce
Hey Bruce,Just got some initial feedback. They’re mostly aligned — only question waswhether implementation support is included in the first month. – Sophia

Yes — full onboarding and implementation support are included for the first 30 days at no extra cost. I’ll highlight that in a revised version.Also happy to get on Slack if that’s easier for your side.Best,Bruce
That helps a lot, thank you. Feel free to send the updated doc. And yes —let's move this to Slack, it’s faster for us at this point. I’ve sent you adm on slack.Thanks,Sophia
Got the invite — thank you. Uploading the revised version now. Looking forward to wrapping this up smoothly.Talk soon,Bruce

summary: The sales thread initiated by Bruce Wayne (rep) with Sophia Nguyen (prospect) involved the submission and review of a Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade proposal. Sophia raised a clarification regarding implementation support, which Bruce promptly addressed and committed to updating the proposal. The conversation concluded with plans to transition communication to Slack to expedite the finalization of the deal.
